tools.name: place_cube
tools.title: Place Cube
tools.description: Places a cube of the given size at the specified position. Texture and group are optional.

texture.description: Texture ID or name to apply to the cube.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name to apply to the cube.

group.description: Group/bone to which the cube belongs.
group.markdownDescription: Group/bone to which the cube belongs.

anyOf.description: Array of faces to apply the texture to.
anyOf.markdownDescription: Array of faces to apply the texture to.

anyOf.description: Whether to apply the texture to all faces. Set to `true` to enable auto UV mapping.
anyOf.markdownDescription: Whether to apply the texture to all faces. Set to `true` to enable auto UV mapping.

face.description: Face to apply the texture to.
face.markdownDescription: Face to apply the texture to.

uv.description: Custom UV mapping for the face.
uv.markdownDescription: Custom UV mapping for the face.

anyOf.description: Array of faces with custom UV mapping.
anyOf.markdownDescription: Array of faces with custom UV mapping.

faces.description: Faces to apply the texture to. Set to `true` to enable auto UV mapping.
faces.markdownDescription: Faces to apply the texture to. Set to `true` to enable auto UV mapping.

tools.name: modify_cube
tools.title: Modify Cube
tools.description: Modifies the cube with the given ID. Auto UV setting: saved as an integer, where 0 means disabled, 1 means enabled, and 2 means relative auto UV (cube position affects UV)

id.description: ID or name of the cube to modify. Defaults to selected, which could be more than one.
id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube to modify. Defaults to selected, which could be more than one.

autouv.description: Auto UV setting. 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled, 2 = relative auto UV.
autouv.markdownDescription: Auto UV setting. 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled, 2 = relative auto UV.

shade.description: Whether to apply shading to the cube.
shade.markdownDescription: Whether to apply shading to the cube.

color.description: Single digit to represent a color from a palette.
color.markdownDescription: Single digit to represent a color from a palette.

visibility.description: Whether the cube is visible or not.
visibility.markdownDescription: Whether the cube is visible or not.

tools.name: capture_screenshot
tools.title: Capture Screenshot
tools.description: Returns the image data of the current view.

tools.name: capture_app_screenshot
tools.title: Capture App Screenshot
tools.description: Returns the image data of the Blockbench app.

tools.name: set_camera_angle
tools.title: Set Camera Angle
tools.description: Sets the camera angle to the specified value.

tools.name: create_animation
tools.title: Create Animation
tools.description: Creates a new animation with keyframes for bones.

animation_length.description: Length of the animation in seconds
animation_length.markdownDescription: Length of the animation in seconds

particle_effects.description: Particle effects with timestamps as keys
particle_effects.markdownDescription: Particle effects with timestamps as keys

tools.name: manage_keyframes
tools.title: Manage Keyframes
tools.description: Creates, deletes, or edits keyframes in the animation timeline for specific bones and channels.

animation_id.description: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.
animation_id.markdownDescription: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.

bone_name.description: Name of the bone/group to manage keyframes for.
bone_name.markdownDescription: Name of the bone/group to manage keyframes for.

time.description: Time in seconds for the keyframe.
time.markdownDescription: Time in seconds for the keyframe.

values.description: Values: [x,y,z] for position/rotation, number for uniform scale.
values.markdownDescription: Values: [x,y,z] for position/rotation, number for uniform scale.

bezier_handles.description: Bezier handle positions for bezier interpolation.
bezier_handles.markdownDescription: Bezier handle positions for bezier interpolation.

tools.name: animation_graph_editor
tools.title: Animation Graph Editor
tools.description: Controls animation curves in the graph editor for fine-tuning animations.

animation_id.description: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.
animation_id.markdownDescription: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.

bone_name.description: Name of the bone/group to modify curves for.
bone_name.markdownDescription: Name of the bone/group to modify curves for.

action.description: Type of curve modification to apply.
action.markdownDescription: Type of curve modification to apply.

keyframe_range.description: Time range to apply the curve modification. If not provided, applies to all keyframes.
keyframe_range.markdownDescription: Time range to apply the curve modification. If not provided, applies to all keyframes.

custom_curve.description: Custom bezier curve control points (only for 'custom' action).
custom_curve.markdownDescription: Custom bezier curve control points (only for 'custom' action).

tools.name: bone_rigging
tools.title: Bone Rigging
tools.description: Creates and manipulates the bone structure (rig) of a model for animation.

action.description: Action to perform on the bone structure.
action.markdownDescription: Action to perform on the bone structure.

children.description: Names of elements to add to this bone.
children.markdownDescription: Names of elements to add to this bone.

ik_enabled.description: Enable inverse kinematics for this bone.
ik_enabled.markdownDescription: Enable inverse kinematics for this bone.

mirror_axis.description: Axis to mirror the bone across.
mirror_axis.markdownDescription: Axis to mirror the bone across.

tools.name: animation_timeline
tools.title: Animation Timeline
tools.description: Controls the animation timeline, including playback, time scrubbing, and timeline settings.

length.description: Animation length in seconds (for set_length action).
length.markdownDescription: Animation length in seconds (for set_length action).

tools.name: batch_keyframe_operations
tools.title: Batch Keyframe Operations
tools.description: Performs batch operations on multiple keyframes at once.

scale_factor.description: Scale factor for time or values.
scale_factor.markdownDescription: Scale factor for time or values.

tools.name: animation_copy_paste
tools.title: Animation Copy/Paste
tools.description: Copies and pastes animation data between bones or animations.

time_range.description: Time range to copy. If not provided, copies all keyframes.
time_range.markdownDescription: Time range to copy. If not provided, copies all keyframes.

mirror_axis.description: Axis to mirror across for mirror_paste.
mirror_axis.markdownDescription: Axis to mirror across for mirror_paste.

tools.name: list_armatures
tools.title: List Armatures
tools.description: Lists all armatures in the current project with their basic info.

tools.name: get_armature
tools.title: Get Armature
tools.description: Gets detailed information about a specific armature including its bones.

id.description: UUID or name of the armature.
id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the armature.

include_bones.description: Whether to include bone hierarchy in response.
include_bones.markdownDescription: Whether to include bone hierarchy in response.

tools.name: add_armature
tools.title: Add Armature
tools.description: Creates a new armature in the project. An armature is a skeletal rig used for mesh deformation.

add_initial_bone.description: Whether to add an initial bone to the armature.
add_initial_bone.markdownDescription: Whether to add an initial bone to the armature.

tools.name: remove_armature
tools.title: Remove Armature
tools.description: Removes an armature and all its bones from the project.

id.description: UUID or name of the armature to remove.
id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the armature to remove.

tools.name: update_armature
tools.title: Update Armature
tools.description: Updates properties of an existing armature.

id.description: UUID or name of the armature.
id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the armature.

tools.name: list_armature_bones
tools.title: List Armature Bones
tools.description: Lists all armature bones, optionally filtered by a specific armature.

armature_id.description: Filter bones by armature UUID or name. If not provided, lists all bones.
armature_id.markdownDescription: Filter bones by armature UUID or name. If not provided, lists all bones.

tools.name: get_armature_bone
tools.title: Get Armature Bone
tools.description: Gets detailed information about a specific armature bone.

id.description: UUID or name of the bone.
id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the bone.

include_weights.description: Whether to include all vertex weights in response.
include_weights.markdownDescription: Whether to include all vertex weights in response.

tools.name: add_armature_bone
tools.title: Add Armature Bone
tools.description: Creates a new bone and adds it to an armature or parent bone.

parent_id.description: UUID or name of parent armature or bone.
parent_id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of parent armature or bone.

origin.description: Position of the bone. Defaults to [0, parent.length, 0] for child bones.
origin.markdownDescription: Position of the bone. Defaults to [0, parent.length, 0] for child bones.

connected.description: Whether bone is connected to parent.
connected.markdownDescription: Whether bone is connected to parent.

tools.name: remove_armature_bone
tools.title: Remove Armature Bone
tools.description: Removes an armature bone from the project.

id.description: UUID or name of the bone to remove.
id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the bone to remove.

remove_children.description: Whether to also remove child bones.
remove_children.markdownDescription: Whether to also remove child bones.

tools.name: update_armature_bone
tools.title: Update Armature Bone
tools.description: Updates properties of an existing armature bone.

id.description: UUID or name of the bone.
id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the bone.

rotation.description: New rotation [x, y, z] in degrees.
rotation.markdownDescription: New rotation [x, y, z] in degrees.

tools.name: update_armature_bones_batch
tools.title: Update Armature Bones (Batch)
tools.description: Updates multiple armature bones at once with the same properties.

items.description: ID or name of the element.
items.markdownDescription: ID or name of the element.

ids.description: Array of bone UUIDs or names to update.
ids.markdownDescription: Array of bone UUIDs or names to update.

tools.name: select_armature_bones
tools.title: Select Armature Bones
tools.description: Selects armature bones by ID. Can select single bone, multiple bones, or bone hierarchy.

items.description: ID or name of the element.
items.markdownDescription: ID or name of the element.

ids.description: Array of bone UUIDs or names to select.
ids.markdownDescription: Array of bone UUIDs or names to select.

armature_id.description: Select all bones in this armature.
armature_id.markdownDescription: Select all bones in this armature.

include_descendants.description: Include all descendant bones in selection.
include_descendants.markdownDescription: Include all descendant bones in selection.

tools.name: get_vertex_weights
tools.title: Get Vertex Weights
tools.description: Gets vertex weights for a mesh from all bones affecting it.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

tools.name: set_vertex_weight
tools.title: Set Vertex Weight
tools.description: Sets the weight of a specific vertex on a bone.

bone_id.description: UUID or name of the bone.
bone_id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the bone.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

vertex_key.description: Key of the vertex in the mesh.
vertex_key.markdownDescription: Key of the vertex in the mesh.

weight.description: Weight value (0-1). Set to 0 to remove weight.
weight.markdownDescription: Weight value (0-1). Set to 0 to remove weight.

tools.name: set_vertex_weights_batch
tools.title: Set Vertex Weights (Batch)
tools.description: Sets multiple vertex weights at once on a bone.

bone_id.description: UUID or name of the bone.
bone_id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the bone.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

tools.name: clear_vertex_weights
tools.title: Clear Vertex Weights
tools.description: Clears all vertex weights from a bone for a specific mesh.

bone_id.description: UUID or name of the bone.
bone_id.markdownDescription: UUID or name of the bone.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

tools.name: remove_element
tools.title: Remove Element
tools.description: Removes the element with the given ID.

id.description: ID or name of the element to remove.
id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the element to remove.

tools.name: add_group
tools.title: Add Group
tools.description: Adds a new group with the given name and options.

autouv.description: Auto UV setting. 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled, 2 = relative auto UV.
autouv.markdownDescription: Auto UV setting. 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled, 2 = relative auto UV.

tools.name: list_outline
tools.title: List Outline
tools.description: Returns a list of all groups and their children in the Blockbench editor.

tools.name: duplicate_element
tools.title: Duplicate Element
tools.description: Duplicates a cube, mesh or group by ID or name.  You may offset the duplicate or assign a new name.

id.description: ID or name of the element to duplicate.
id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the element to duplicate.

tools.name: rename_element
tools.title: Rename Element
tools.description: Renames a cube, mesh or group by ID or name.

id.description: ID or name of the element to rename.
id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the element to rename.

tools.name: from_geo_json
tools.title: Import GeoJSON
tools.description: Imports a model from a GeoJSON file.

geojson.description: Path to the GeoJSON file or data URL, or the GeoJSON string itself.
geojson.markdownDescription: Path to the GeoJSON file or data URL, or the GeoJSON string itself.

tools.name: get_face_material_instances
tools.title: Get Face Material Instances
tools.description: Gets the material instance names for cube faces. Material instances are used in Bedrock Block format to map faces to materials defined in the minecraft:material_instances component.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses the first selected cube.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses the first selected cube.

faces.description: Specific faces to get/clear material instances for. If not provided, returns/clears all faces.
faces.markdownDescription: Specific faces to get/clear material instances for. If not provided, returns/clears all faces.

tools.name: set_face_material_instance
tools.title: Set Face Material Instance
tools.description: Sets the material instance name for one or more cube faces. Material instances are strings that map to materials defined in the minecraft:material_instances component for Bedrock Block format.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, applies to all selected cubes.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, applies to all selected cubes.

material_name.description: The material instance name to assign. Use empty string to clear the material instance.
material_name.markdownDescription: The material instance name to assign. Use empty string to clear the material instance.

faces.description: Faces to set the material instance on. Defaults to all faces.
faces.markdownDescription: Faces to set the material instance on. Defaults to all faces.

tools.name: list_material_instances
tools.title: List Material Instances
tools.description: Lists all unique material instance names used in the project. Returns the material instance names along with which cubes and faces use them.

tools.name: bulk_set_material_instances
tools.title: Bulk Set Material Instances
tools.description: Sets material instance names on multiple cubes at once. Useful for assigning different material instances to different faces across the project.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube.

faces.description: Faces to set the material instance on.
faces.markdownDescription: Faces to set the material instance on.

tools.name: clear_material_instances
tools.title: Clear Material Instances
tools.description: Clears (removes) material instance names from cube faces. Useful for resetting material assignments.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, clears from all selected cubes.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, clears from all selected cubes.

faces.description: Specific faces to clear. If not provided, clears all faces.
faces.markdownDescription: Specific faces to clear. If not provided, clears all faces.

all_cubes.description: If true, clears material instances from all cubes in the project.
all_cubes.markdownDescription: If true, clears material instances from all cubes in the project.

tools.name: place_mesh
tools.title: Place Mesh
tools.description: Places a mesh at the specified position. Texture and group are optional.

texture.description: Texture ID or name to apply to the mesh.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name to apply to the mesh.

group.description: Group/bone to which the mesh belongs.
group.markdownDescription: Group/bone to which the mesh belongs.

tools.name: extrude_mesh
tools.title: Extrude Mesh
tools.description: Extrudes selected faces or edges of a mesh.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

mode.description: What to extrude: faces, edges, or vertices.
mode.markdownDescription: What to extrude: faces, edges, or vertices.

tools.name: subdivide_mesh
tools.title: Subdivide Mesh
tools.description: Subdivides selected faces of a mesh to create more geometry.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

cuts.description: Number of subdivision cuts to make.
cuts.markdownDescription: Number of subdivision cuts to make.

tools.name: create_sphere
tools.title: Create Sphere
tools.description: Creates a sphere mesh at the specified position with the given parameters. The sphere is created as a mesh with vertices and faces using spherical coordinates.

sides.description: Number of horizontal divisions (affects sphere quality).
sides.markdownDescription: Number of horizontal divisions (affects sphere quality).

align_edges.description: Whether to align edges for better geometry.
align_edges.markdownDescription: Whether to align edges for better geometry.

texture.description: Texture ID or name to apply to the sphere.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name to apply to the sphere.

group.description: Group/bone to which the sphere belongs.
group.markdownDescription: Group/bone to which the sphere belongs.

tools.name: select_mesh_elements
tools.title: Select Mesh Elements
tools.description: Selects vertices, edges, or faces of a mesh for manipulation.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh to select elements from.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh to select elements from.

elements.description: Specific elements to select. If not provided, selects all.
elements.markdownDescription: Specific elements to select. If not provided, selects all.

action.description: Selection action: select (replace), add, remove, or toggle.
action.markdownDescription: Selection action: select (replace), add, remove, or toggle.

tools.name: move_mesh_vertices
tools.title: Move Mesh Vertices
tools.description: Moves selected vertices of a mesh by the specified offset.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

offset.description: Offset to move vertices by [x, y, z].
offset.markdownDescription: Offset to move vertices by [x, y, z].

vertices.description: Specific vertex keys to move. If not provided, moves all selected vertices.
vertices.markdownDescription: Specific vertex keys to move. If not provided, moves all selected vertices.

tools.name: delete_mesh_elements
tools.title: Delete Mesh Elements
tools.description: Deletes selected vertices, edges, or faces from a mesh.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

mode.description: What to delete: vertices, edges, or faces.
mode.markdownDescription: What to delete: vertices, edges, or faces.

keep_vertices.description: When deleting faces/edges, whether to keep the vertices.
keep_vertices.markdownDescription: When deleting faces/edges, whether to keep the vertices.

tools.name: merge_mesh_vertices
tools.title: Merge Mesh Vertices
tools.description: Merges vertices that are within a specified distance of each other.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh.

threshold.description: Maximum distance between vertices to merge.
threshold.markdownDescription: Maximum distance between vertices to merge.

selected_only.description: Whether to only merge selected vertices.
selected_only.markdownDescription: Whether to only merge selected vertices.

tools.name: create_mesh_face
tools.title: Create Mesh Face
tools.description: Creates a new face from selected vertices.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

vertices.description: Vertex keys to create face from. Must be 3 or 4 vertices.
vertices.markdownDescription: Vertex keys to create face from. Must be 3 or 4 vertices.

texture.description: Texture ID or name to apply to the new face.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name to apply to the new face.

tools.name: create_cylinder
tools.title: Create Cylinder
tools.description: Creates one or more cylinder meshes with optional end caps.

texture.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

tools.name: knife_tool
tools.title: Knife Tool
tools.description: Uses the knife tool to cut custom edges into mesh faces.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh to cut.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh to cut.

face.description: Face key to attach the point to.
face.markdownDescription: Face key to attach the point to.

tools.name: paint_fill_tool
tools.title: Paint Fill Tool
tools.description: Uses the fill/bucket tool to fill areas with color.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

tools.name: draw_shape_tool
tools.title: Draw Shape Tool
tools.description: Draws geometric shapes on textures.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

shape.description: Shape to draw. '_h' suffix means hollow.
shape.markdownDescription: Shape to draw. '_h' suffix means hollow.

tools.name: gradient_tool
tools.title: Gradient Tool
tools.description: Applies gradients to textures.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

tools.name: color_picker_tool
tools.title: Color Picker Tool
tools.description: Picks colors from textures and sets them as the active color.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

x.description: X coordinate to pick color from.
x.markdownDescription: X coordinate to pick color from.

y.description: Y coordinate to pick color from.
y.markdownDescription: Y coordinate to pick color from.

set_as_secondary.description: Set as secondary color instead of primary.
set_as_secondary.markdownDescription: Set as secondary color instead of primary.

pick_opacity.description: Also pick and apply the pixel's opacity.
pick_opacity.markdownDescription: Also pick and apply the pixel's opacity.

tools.name: copy_brush_tool
tools.title: Copy Brush Tool
tools.description: Uses the copy/clone brush to copy texture areas.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

x.description: Source X coordinate to copy from.
x.markdownDescription: Source X coordinate to copy from.

y.description: Source Y coordinate to copy from.
y.markdownDescription: Source Y coordinate to copy from.

x.description: Target X coordinate to paste to.
x.markdownDescription: Target X coordinate to paste to.

y.description: Target Y coordinate to paste to.
y.markdownDescription: Target Y coordinate to paste to.

tools.name: eraser_tool
tools.title: Eraser Tool
tools.description: Erases parts of textures with customizable settings.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

coordinates.description: Array of coordinates to erase at.
coordinates.markdownDescription: Array of coordinates to erase at.

connect_strokes.description: Whether to connect erase strokes with lines.
connect_strokes.markdownDescription: Whether to connect erase strokes with lines.

tools.name: paint_settings
tools.title: Paint Settings
tools.description: Configures paint mode settings and preferences.

x.description: X coordinate of texture mirror center.
x.markdownDescription: X coordinate of texture mirror center.

y.description: Y coordinate of texture mirror center.
y.markdownDescription: Y coordinate of texture mirror center.

paint_side_restrict.description: Restrict painting to current face side.
paint_side_restrict.markdownDescription: Restrict painting to current face side.

paint_with_stylus_only.description: Only allow painting with stylus input.
paint_with_stylus_only.markdownDescription: Only allow painting with stylus input.

pick_color_opacity.description: Pick opacity when using color picker.
pick_color_opacity.markdownDescription: Pick opacity when using color picker.

tools.name: paint_with_brush
tools.title: Paint with Brush
tools.description: Paints on textures using the brush tool with customizable settings.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

coordinates.description: Array of coordinates to paint at.
coordinates.markdownDescription: Array of coordinates to paint at.

connect_strokes.description: Whether to connect paint strokes with lines.
connect_strokes.markdownDescription: Whether to connect paint strokes with lines.

tools.name: create_brush_preset
tools.title: Create Brush Preset
tools.description: Creates a custom brush preset with specified settings.

tools.name: load_brush_preset
tools.title: Load Brush Preset
tools.description: Loads and applies a brush preset by name.

preset_name.description: Name of the brush preset to load.
preset_name.markdownDescription: Name of the brush preset to load.

tools.name: texture_selection
tools.title: Texture Selection
tools.description: Creates, modifies, or manipulates texture selections for painting.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

tools.name: texture_layer_management
tools.title: Texture Layer Management
tools.description: Creates, manages, and manipulates texture layers.

texture_id.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture_id.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

tools.name: create_project
tools.title: Create Project
tools.description: Creates a new project with the given name and project type.

format.description: Project format ID from Blockbench's Formats registry.
format.markdownDescription: Project format ID from Blockbench's Formats registry.

tools.name: create_texture
tools.title: Create Texture
tools.description: Creates a new texture with the given name and size.

data.description: Path to the image file or data URL.
data.markdownDescription: Path to the image file or data URL.

fill_color.description: RGBA color to fill the texture, as tuple or HEX string.
fill_color.markdownDescription: RGBA color to fill the texture, as tuple or HEX string.

layer_name.description: Name of the texture layer. Required if fill_color is set.
layer_name.markdownDescription: Name of the texture layer. Required if fill_color is set.

pbr_channel.description: PBR channel to use for the texture. Color, normal, height, or Metalness/Emissive/Roughness (MER) map.
pbr_channel.markdownDescription: PBR channel to use for the texture. Color, normal, height, or Metalness/Emissive/Roughness (MER) map.

render_mode.description: Render mode for the texture. Default, emissive, additive, or layered.
render_mode.markdownDescription: Render mode for the texture. Default, emissive, additive, or layered.

render_sides.description: Render sides for the texture. Auto, front, or double.
render_sides.markdownDescription: Render sides for the texture. Auto, front, or double.

tools.name: apply_texture
tools.title: Apply Texture
tools.description: Applies the given texture to the element with the specified ID.

id.description: ID or name of the element to apply the texture to.
id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the element to apply the texture to.

texture.description: ID or name of the texture to apply.
texture.markdownDescription: ID or name of the texture to apply.

applyTo.description: Apply texture to element or group.
applyTo.markdownDescription: Apply texture to element or group.

tools.name: add_texture_group
tools.title: Add Texture Group
tools.description: Adds a new texture group with the given name.

textures.description: Array of texture IDs or names to add to the group.
textures.markdownDescription: Array of texture IDs or names to add to the group.

is_material.description: Whether the texture group is a PBR material or not.
is_material.markdownDescription: Whether the texture group is a PBR material or not.

tools.name: list_textures
tools.title: List Textures
tools.description: Returns a list of all textures in the Blockbench editor.

tools.name: get_texture
tools.title: Get Texture
tools.description: Returns the image data of the given texture or default texture.

texture.description: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID or name. If not provided, uses selected texture.

tools.name: create_pbr_material
tools.title: Create PBR Material
tools.description: Creates a new PBR material (texture group with is_material=true) and optionally assigns textures to PBR channels. Use this for Minecraft Bedrock resource packs or any format supporting PBR.

color_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the color (albedo) channel.
color_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the color (albedo) channel.

normal_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the normal map channel.
normal_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the normal map channel.

height_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the height/displacement map channel.
height_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the height/displacement map channel.

mer_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the MER (Metalness/Emissive/Roughness) channel.
mer_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the MER (Metalness/Emissive/Roughness) channel.

color_value.description: Uniform RGBA color [R,G,B,A] when no color texture is provided.
color_value.markdownDescription: Uniform RGBA color [R,G,B,A] when no color texture is provided.

mer_value.description: Uniform MER values [Metalness, Emissive, Roughness] (0-255) when no MER texture is provided.
mer_value.markdownDescription: Uniform MER values [Metalness, Emissive, Roughness] (0-255) when no MER texture is provided.

subsurface_value.description: Subsurface scattering value (0-255) for Bedrock 1.21.30+ materials.
subsurface_value.markdownDescription: Subsurface scattering value (0-255) for Bedrock 1.21.30+ materials.

tools.name: configure_material
tools.title: Configure Material
tools.description: Configures an existing PBR material's properties including channel assignments, uniform values, and subsurface scattering.

material.description: Material name or UUID to configure.
material.markdownDescription: Material name or UUID to configure.

color_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the color channel, or 'none' to use uniform color.
color_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the color channel, or 'none' to use uniform color.

normal_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the normal map, or 'none' to remove.
normal_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the normal map, or 'none' to remove.

height_texture.description: Texture ID/name for the height map, or 'none' to remove.
height_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for the height map, or 'none' to remove.

mer_texture.description: Texture ID/name for MER channel, or 'none' to use uniform values.
mer_texture.markdownDescription: Texture ID/name for MER channel, or 'none' to use uniform values.

color_value.description: Uniform RGBA color [R,G,B,A] when no color texture.
color_value.markdownDescription: Uniform RGBA color [R,G,B,A] when no color texture.

tools.name: list_materials
tools.title: List Materials
tools.description: Lists all PBR materials (texture groups with is_material=true) and their assigned textures per channel.

tools.name: get_material_info
tools.title: Get Material Info
tools.description: Gets detailed information about a PBR material including the compiled texture_set.json preview for Bedrock export.

tools.name: import_texture_set
tools.title: Import Texture Set
tools.description: Imports a Minecraft Bedrock texture_set.json file and creates a PBR material with the associated textures.

path.description: Path to the .texture_set.json file to import.
path.markdownDescription: Path to the .texture_set.json file to import.

tools.name: assign_texture_channel
tools.title: Assign Texture Channel
tools.description: Assigns a texture to a specific PBR channel within a material.

texture.description: Texture name or UUID to assign.
texture.markdownDescription: Texture name or UUID to assign.

channel.description: PBR channel to assign the texture to.
channel.markdownDescription: PBR channel to assign the texture to.

tools.name: save_material_config
tools.title: Save Material Config
tools.description: Saves the material's texture_set.json file to disk (Bedrock format). Requires the color texture to have a valid file path.

material.description: Material name or UUID to save.
material.markdownDescription: Material name or UUID to save.

tools.name: trigger_action
tools.title: Trigger Action
tools.description: Triggers an action in the Blockbench editor.

action.description: Action ID from Blockbench's BarItems registry.
action.markdownDescription: Action ID from Blockbench's BarItems registry.

confirmDialog.description: Whether or not to automatically confirm any dialogs that appear as a result of the action.
confirmDialog.markdownDescription: Whether or not to automatically confirm any dialogs that appear as a result of the action.

tools.name: risky_eval
tools.title: Eval
tools.description: Evaluates the given expression and logs it to the console. Do not pass `console` commands as they will not work.

code.description: JavaScript code to evaluate. Do not pass `console` commands or comments.
code.markdownDescription: JavaScript code to evaluate. Do not pass `console` commands or comments.

tools.name: emulate_clicks
tools.title: Emulate Clicks
tools.description: Emulates clicks on the given interface elements.

duration.description: Duration of the drag in milliseconds.
duration.markdownDescription: Duration of the drag in milliseconds.

drag.description: Drag options. If set, will perform a drag from position to 'to'.
drag.markdownDescription: Drag options. If set, will perform a drag from position to 'to'.

tools.name: fill_dialog
tools.title: Fill Dialog
tools.description: Fills the dialog with the given values.

values.description: Stringified form of values to fill the dialog with.
values.markdownDescription: Stringified form of values to fill the dialog with.

confirm.description: Whether to confirm or cancel the dialog after filling it. True to confirm, false to cancel.
confirm.markdownDescription: Whether to confirm or cancel the dialog after filling it. True to confirm, false to cancel.

tools.name: set_mesh_uv
tools.title: Set Mesh UV
tools.description: Sets UV coordinates for mesh faces or vertices.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh.

face_key.description: Face key to set UV for.
face_key.markdownDescription: Face key to set UV for.

uv_mapping.description: UV coordinates for each vertex of the face.
uv_mapping.markdownDescription: UV coordinates for each vertex of the face.

tools.name: auto_uv_mesh
tools.title: Auto UV Mesh
tools.description: Automatically generates UV mapping for selected mesh faces.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

mode.description: UV mapping mode: project from view, unwrap, cylinder, or sphere mapping.
mode.markdownDescription: UV mapping mode: project from view, unwrap, cylinder, or sphere mapping.

faces.description: Specific face keys to UV map. If not provided, maps all selected faces.
faces.markdownDescription: Specific face keys to UV map. If not provided, maps all selected faces.

tools.name: rotate_mesh_uv
tools.title: Rotate Mesh UV
tools.description: Rotates UV coordinates of selected mesh faces.

mesh_id.description: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.
mesh_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the mesh. If not provided, uses selected mesh.

faces.description: Specific face keys to rotate UV for. If not provided, rotates all selected faces.
faces.markdownDescription: Specific face keys to rotate UV for. If not provided, rotates all selected faces.

tools.name: hytale_get_format_info
tools.title: Get Hytale Format Info
tools.description: Returns information about the current Hytale format. Requires the Hytale plugin and a Hytale format project to be active.

tools.name: hytale_validate_model
tools.title: Validate Hytale Model
tools.description: Validates the current Hytale model against Hytale engine constraints (node count, UV sizes, etc.).

tools.name: hytale_set_cube_properties
tools.title: Set Hytale Cube Properties
tools.description: Sets Hytale-specific properties on a cube: shading_mode (flat, standard, fullbright, reflective) and double_sided.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.

shading_mode.description: Shading mode: flat (no lighting), standard (normal), fullbright (emissive), reflective
shading_mode.markdownDescription: Shading mode: flat (no lighting), standard (normal), fullbright (emissive), reflective

double_sided.description: Whether to render both sides of faces
double_sided.markdownDescription: Whether to render both sides of faces

tools.name: hytale_get_cube_properties
tools.title: Get Hytale Cube Properties
tools.description: Gets Hytale-specific properties from a cube (shading_mode, double_sided).

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.

tools.name: hytale_create_quad
tools.title: Create Hytale Quad
tools.description: Creates a Hytale quad (2D plane) with a specified normal direction. Quads are single-face elements useful for flat surfaces.

tools.name: hytale_list_attachments
tools.title: List Hytale Attachments
tools.description: Lists all attachment collections in the current Hytale project.

tools.name: hytale_set_attachment_piece
tools.title: Set Attachment Piece
tools.description: Marks or unmarks a group as an attachment piece. Attachment pieces attach to like-named bones in the main model.

group_name.description: Name of the group to mark as attachment piece
group_name.markdownDescription: Name of the group to mark as attachment piece

is_piece.description: Whether the group is an attachment piece
is_piece.markdownDescription: Whether the group is an attachment piece

tools.name: hytale_list_attachment_pieces
tools.title: List Attachment Pieces
tools.description: Lists all groups marked as attachment pieces.

tools.name: hytale_create_visibility_keyframe
tools.title: Create Visibility Keyframe
tools.description: Creates a visibility keyframe for a bone. Hytale supports toggling node visibility at keyframes.

time.description: Time in seconds for the keyframe
time.markdownDescription: Time in seconds for the keyframe

visible.description: Whether the bone is visible at this keyframe
visible.markdownDescription: Whether the bone is visible at this keyframe

animation_id.description: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.
animation_id.markdownDescription: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.

tools.name: hytale_set_animation_loop
tools.title: Set Animation Loop Mode
tools.description: Sets the loop mode for a Hytale animation. Hytale supports "loop" (continuous) or "hold" (freeze on last frame).

animation_id.description: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.
animation_id.markdownDescription: Animation UUID or name. If not provided, uses current animation.

loop_mode.description: Loop mode: loop (continuous), hold (freeze on last frame), once (play once)
loop_mode.markdownDescription: Loop mode: loop (continuous), hold (freeze on last frame), once (play once)

tools.name: hytale_set_cube_stretch
tools.title: Set Cube Stretch
tools.description: Sets the stretch values for a cube. Hytale uses stretch instead of float sizes for better UV handling.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.

tools.name: hytale_get_cube_stretch
tools.title: Get Cube Stretch
tools.description: Gets the stretch values for a cube.

cube_id.description: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.
cube_id.markdownDescription: ID or name of the cube. If not provided, uses selected cube.

prompts.name: blockbench_native_apis
prompts.title: blockbench_native_apis
prompts.description: Essential information about Blockbench v5.0 native API security model and requireNativeModule() usage. Use this when working with Node.js modules, file system access, or native APIs in Blockbench plugins.

prompts.name: blockbench_code_eval_safety
prompts.title: blockbench_code_eval_safety
prompts.description: Critical safety guide for agents using code evaluation/execution tools with Blockbench v5.0+. Contains breaking changes, quick reference, common mistakes, and safe code patterns for native module usage.

prompts.name: model_creation_strategy
prompts.title: Model Creation Strategy
prompts.description: A strategy for creating a new 3D model in Blockbench.

prompts.name: hytale_model_creation
prompts.title: Hytale Model Creation Guide
prompts.description: Comprehensive guide for creating Hytale character and prop models. Covers format selection, node limits, shading modes, stretch, quads, and best practices.

format_type.description: Which format type to focus on.
format_type.markdownDescription: Which format type to focus on.

prompts.name: hytale_animation_workflow
prompts.title: Hytale Animation Workflow
prompts.description: Guide for creating animations for Hytale models. Covers 60 FPS timing, quaternion rotations, visibility keyframes, loop modes, and common animation patterns.

animation_type.description: Type of animation to focus on.
animation_type.markdownDescription: Type of animation to focus on.

prompts.name: hytale_attachments
prompts.title: Hytale Attachments System
prompts.description: Guide for creating and managing attachments in Hytale models. Covers attachment collections, piece bones, modular equipment, and best practices.

resources.name: projects
resources.title: Blockbench Projects
resources.description: Returns information about available projects in Blockbench. Use without an ID to list all projects, or provide a project UUID/name to get details about a specific project.

resources.name: nodes
resources.title: Blockbench Nodes
resources.description: Returns the current nodes in the Blockbench editor.

resources.name: textures
resources.title: Blockbench Textures
resources.description: Returns information about textures in the current Blockbench project. Use without an ID to list all textures, or provide a texture UUID/name to get details about a specific texture.

resources.name: reference_models
resources.title: Reference Models
resources.description: Returns information about reference models in the current Blockbench project. Requires the Reference Models plugin.

resources.name: validator-status
resources.title: Validator Status
resources.description: Returns the current validation status including error/warning counts and a summary of all problems.

resources.name: validator-checks
resources.title: Validator Checks
resources.description: Returns information about registered validator checks. Use without an ID to list all checks, or provide a check ID to get details about a specific check.

resources.name: validator-warnings
resources.title: Validator Warnings
resources.description: Returns all current validation warnings with element references where available.

resources.name: validator-errors
resources.title: Validator Errors
resources.description: Returns all current validation errors with element references where available.

resources.name: hytale-format
resources.title: Hytale Format Information
resources.description: Returns comprehensive information about the current Hytale format, including format type, block size, node limits, and feature support.

resources.name: hytale-attachments
resources.title: Hytale Attachments
resources.description: Returns information about attachment collections in the current Hytale project.

resources.name: hytale-pieces
resources.title: Hytale Attachment Pieces
resources.description: Returns information about groups marked as attachment pieces. Attachment pieces connect to like-named bones in the main model.

resources.name: hytale-cubes
resources.title: Hytale Cubes
resources.description: Returns information about cubes with Hytale-specific properties (shading_mode, double_sided, stretch).
